column1: Flow ID,Name,Description,Test Steps,Flow Priority

1,Verify Checkout Process with Multiple Items in Cart,"Navigate to the inventory, add multiple items to the cart, remove some items, fill out shipping information, proceed to checkout confirmation, and complete the checkout. Verify returning to the inventory page.","Step 1: Navigate to https://www.saucedemo.com/
Step 2: Login -> Navigate to page 'inventory.html'
Step 3: Click on button 'add-to-cart-sauce-labs-backpack'
Step 4: Click on button 'add-to-cart-sauce-labs-bolt-t-shirt'
Step 5: Click on button 'add-to-cart-sauce-labs-onesie'
Step 6: Click on button 'add-to-cart-test.allthethings()-t-shirt-(red)'
Step 7: Click on button 'add-to-cart-sauce-labs-bike-light'
Step 8: Click on link '5' -> Navigate to page 'cart.html'
Step 9: Click on button 'remove-sauce-labs-bike-light'
Step 10: Click on button 'remove-sauce-labs-bolt-t-shirt'
Step 11: Fill out shipping information and proceed to checkout confirmation

column2: - Step 1: Click on button 'checkout' -> Navigate to page 'checkout-step-one.html'
- Step 3: Enter input value in input field 'firstName'
- Step 5: Enter input value in input field 'lastName'
- Step 7: Enter input value in input field 'postalCode'

column1: Step 12: Click on button 'finish' -> Navigate to page 'checkout-complete.html'
Step 13: Click on button 'back-to-products' -> Navigate to page 'inventory.html'
Step 14: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint

,High
2,Verify Checkout Completion for Specific Item,Navigate to a specific item, add it to the cart, continue shopping, fill out shipping information, proceed to checkout confirmation, and complete the checkout. Verify the completion page.","Step 1: Navigate to https://www.saucedemo.com/
Step 2: Login -> Navigate to page 'inventory.html'
Step 3: Click on link 'item 3 title link' -> Navigate to page 'inventory-item.html'
Step 4: Click on button 'add-to-cart'
Step 5: Click on button 'back-to-products' -> Navigate to page 'inventory.html'
Step 6: Click on button 'add-to-cart-sauce-labs-backpack'
Step 7: Click on link '2' -> Navigate to page 'cart.html'
Step 8: Click on button 'continue-shopping' -> Navigate to page 'inventory.html'
Step 9: Click on button 'add-to-cart-sauce-labs-bike-light'
Step 10: Click on link '3' -> Navigate to page 'cart.html'
Step 11: Click on div
Step 12: Fill out shipping information and proceed to checkout confirmation

column2: - Step 1: Click on button 'checkout' -> Navigate to page 'checkout-step-one.html'
- Step 3: Enter input value in input field 'firstName'
- Step 5: Enter input value in input field 'lastName'
- Step 7: Enter input value in input field 'postalCode'

column1: Step 13: Click on button 'finish' -> Navigate to page 'checkout-complete.html'
Step 14: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint
,High
